In England, in the seven days to 06 October, there were 196,661 new confirmed cases (347.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 September, there were 192,723 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 2% (3,938 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 October is 6,967,915 (12,321.7 cases per 100,000 population).
